article_title: Milton, Edgerton schools win big in heath care lawsuit
article_text:
The Milton and Edgerton school districts will receive the biggest payouts among area school districts in a class action...

article_metadata.Description: Milton and Edgerton school districts are being awarded more than $100,000 each in a settlement over health care money that's been tied up in a class action suit for four years.
article_metadata.author: Neil Johnson
